Description:
Walk to Everything
This 3 bedroom solid brick home is set on a 602m2 block in central drysdale within easy walking distance of the Drysdale primary school, shops, bus stop, and childcare centre. Huge sunny north facing lounge with gas heating and open fire place. Spacious timber kitchen with ample storage, electric cooking and plenty of work space. Built-in robes and central bathroom. Big laundry and enclosed porch/boot room. Extra large single garage and drive through carport. Yard for the kids makes life easy. Inspect this weekend.

Description:
Fancy alfresco entertainment at its very best?
Located in Central Walk Estate, Drysdale's new boutique residential development, this well-presented family home offers an enviable, relaxed lifestyle - just 200 metres from the town centre.
From a wide central passage, the master bedroom enjoys views of the nearby nature reserve, and offers a walk-in robe and a smart ensuite. While a cosy lounge is an ideal spot for viewing TV and movies.
The open-plan lounge/kitchen/dining area is spacious and inviting and leads, via a sliding glass door, to a brilliant outdoor terrace. Extending from the covered dining space, the paved patio features a generous serving bench with an inbuilt BBQ and hot plate, plus an authentic woodfired pizza oven. Enjoying northern sunshine and a terraced garden as a backdrop, this is outdoor entertainment at its finest.
The super-smart kitchen features a Westinghouse electric oven and 5-burner gas cooktop, an Asko dishwasher, and a walk-in pantry. Adjacent are three more bedrooms, the main bathroom with a separate WC, and a laundry with outside access. Ducted gas heating, a slow-combustion wood heater, ceiling fans, and a split system mean year-round comfort. There's also a double lock-up garage, and a garden shed at the rear. Walk to shops, schools, cafes and restaurants, and enjoy the tranquillity of this delightful central reserve.
- Smart contemporary home in boutique residential reserve
- Four bedrooms, two lounges, two bathrooms and laundry
- Outstanding outdoor terrace with BBQ and woodfired pizza oven
- Kitchen with Euro-style appliances and walk-in pantry
- Gas heating, slow-combustion heater, fans and split system
- Double lock-up garage, garden shed, and terraced garden.
Insights: 21 Waterhaven Boulevard, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Living on Grand Proportions
Quality craftmanship, free flowing floor plan, equipped for entertaining and most importantly room for a growing family - it will be hard to find a home that stacks up to this!
The practicality of this floor plan will immediately resonate with any family, cleverly zoned allowing members of the family to have their own space and to entertain in style. If the appealing façade of the home hasn't captured you the grand entry most certainly will have you wanting more. A grand timber door upon entry with custom feature tiles invites you into the fore of the home where you will find the home office, master bedroom including walk-in robe, ensuite with double vanity, shower, toilet and heat lamps. The hallway opens into a grand formal dining room (which can double as another living area) on the left and generous formal living area on the right which can be conveniently zoned from the rest of the home.
A well-appointed kitchen including quality SMEG stainless steel appliances, double fridge cavity, huge walk-in pantry including built-in cabinetry and a trendy bifold kitchen window out onto the undercover area making entertaining a breeze. The kitchen over looks the 2nd dining area and 2nd living area which is equipped with sliding door access out to the undercover area and decked area.
The rear of the home or the children's wing has a fantastic games room equipped with a floating desk and shelving, 3 ample sized bedrooms all with built-in robes and ceiling fans, main bathroom, separate toilet, laundry with built in cabinetry, internal clothes line, built in trough and sliding door access to the yard.
The gardens, both back/front are manicured and low maintenance keeping the appearance aesthetically pleasing year-round. You can entertain on the decked area looking onto the gardens or the expansive undercover area which includes a built-in bar, pizza oven with bench space and well-equipped rear access to home a boat, trailer etc.
This beautifully built home has an abundance of extras to complete all the creature comforts that you can think of such as Swann video intercom, Bosch alarm system, ducted vacuum, custom window furnishings, zoned central heating, split system heating/cooling, celling fans in ALL bedrooms, double lock up garage with remote/internal and rear access, 5KW solar panels (20 panels) and an abundance of storage cupboards throughout.
Located in a sought-after pocket of Drysdale, only a stone throw to the township and all major amenities including public transport and schools. Tucked away in a very appealing Street you really have hit the jackpot with a lavish home in a revered local.
Well built homes fitted with quality fittings and fixtures that has room on grand proportions are sought but rarely found- this might just be the dream home you have been searching for!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 8 Bayvista Parade, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
FAMILY OASIS - EASY LIVING SPACE
A much-loved family home set on a generous 910m2 (approx.) allotment with a large west facing backyard. This immaculate property caters to every modern family with a bright and up-lifting al fresco spirit. Entertaining will be made easy as you step outside to embrace the expansive undercover decking area suitable for use all year around.
Upon entry, an elegant front sitting room is coupled with a second relaxed open design living space that includes a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with an abundance of natural light. This property boasts 4 bedrooms all with B.I.Rs, main with ensuite, a study, ceiling fans, bathroom and double garage. The rear yard is spacious and offers plenty of space for entertaining and children to play.
A compelling family domain, it also includes a Braemer wall heater, split system, separate laundry and under house storage.
Positioned close to quality schools, cafes, golf course, wineries it ensures a convenient lifestyle enabling you to be part of a friendly community.
If you are looking to add to your portfolio this home will just about guarantee you steady capital growth. Perfect for every day family life and entertaining, this is where memories are made.

A PERFECT VILLA, PRICED TO SELL NOW.
This is one of the best spots in town , walk to all village amenities and so well maintained , with generous proportions inside and out, more like a small home. Lounge and dining combined , master bedroom with WIR, second bedroom has robes, large working kitchen, 2 way central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry , even a study space. A great downsizer or top investment.

Description:
Serene Estate
A lifestyle opportunity enabling you to thrive and prosper in an intimate residential estate. Residing in this enviable location offers a lifestyle of coastal living, the convenience of a large regional centre within a 20 minute drive and designed around a semi rural, close knit community with every convenience at your doorstep.
The peninsula location is renowned for the idyllic, outdoor lifestyle. Spend a day at the beach, go fishing or enjoy a glass of your favourite wine at one of our many local wineries. The Port Phillip Ferry sails twice daily from Portarlington to South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. You will ask yourself why you didn't make the move sooner.
Ground works to commence late 2018.
Selling fast, contact Rhonda Humpage 0457 313609

Description:
Spacious Villa Central Drysdale
Immaculately maintained and perfectly positioned close to the Drysdale Town Centre. This two bedroom villa awaits its new owner. Walking distance to shopping, public transport, medical facilities and the local recreation reserve.
The decor is neutral and light with the living area and main bedroom having a northerley, sunny aspect. The kitchen dining area is roomy and has access to an undercover outdoor entertaining area. Features include air-con, a large WIP, plenty of cupboards and room for a dishwasher.
Two large bedrooms with plenty of storage and a spacious bathroom with separate toilet. The garage has more storage and internal access to the laundry. Second parking space.
Beautiful manicured gardens surround the property with a useful rainwater tank. Land size 322m2.

Description:
Potential Plus
This 3 bedroom brick home is opposite the Drysdale Primary school and within easy walking distance of the Drysdale shopping centre. Set on a 669m2 block of level ground, the house could be renovated, extended, and made into a great family home. Spacious lounge and dining area, big eat-in kitchen, 3 bedrooms with robes, and a central bathroom. It needs a little care and attention inside, but the end result will be worth it. The other option is redevelop the site into townhouses (STCA). Outside is a very private rear yard, single carport and garage.

Description:
Brand New & Ready for Occupation
Located in the heart of Drysdale, walking distance to the supermarkets and main township. Flanked for choice when it comes to major amenities, public transport schools etc.
This well-appointed brand-new, custom built GLENVILL home has been fitted with quality fittings and fixtures and is ready for you to move in. The great thing about this property is the potential, it's in an affordable price bracket, great for first home buyers, downsizers, investors (great yield with a potential of $450pw return). It's neat and complete and fitted with all the creature comforts.
Comprising 4 good sized bedrooms with the master at the fore of the home including a walk-in robe and ensuite completed with stone benchtop, raised vanity, shower and toilet. All 4 bedrooms are equipped with ceiling fans, the remaining 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes.
At the end of the hallway the hub of the home is drenched in natural sunlight from all the surrounding windows making this the ideal area to bask in the natural warmth of the sun. The galley style kitchen is fitted with stone benchtops, stainless steel quality appliances including dishwasher, gas 900mm in-bench stovetop and oven with feature tiled splashback. The kitchen overlooks the dining and living area which has handy access onto the large alfresco area - entertaining couldn't be easier. The rear wing of the home hosts a central bathroom with deep tiled in bath, shower, stone benchtops and raised vanity, separate toilet, laundry with garden access, linen press, broom cupboard and remaining 3 bedrooms.
The front of the home is landscaped yet low maintenance with scope to implement as you please, the north facing back garden is much the same. A generous alfresco area, high private fences, grassed area with plenty of room for a designated vegetable patch, this blank canvas awaits your creative touch.
Features of the home include, gas ducted heating, ceiling fans, split system heating/cooling in the living area, NBN to the home, quality roller blinds throughout, North facing backyard, water tank and a double lock up garage with remote, internal and external access.
The vendor is flexible on settlement and deposit with inspections readily available.
Insights: 26 Clarendon Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Home for Extended Families 1343m2
This established family property is situated close to central Drysdale on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula. Perfect for the large, extended family and situated in an expansive 1343m2 garden setting. A large renovated kitchen and two large living areas can accommodate the busiest family. Bedrooms are spacious and storage space abounds throughout the home.
With a large purpose built ensuite for elderly parents the options in this home are limitless. Well maintained with quality fixtures and fittings.
The garden has established trees scattered throughout with dual access and double garage at the rear of the property. Perfect for the tradie with work vans.
Inspection a must

Description:
Court Location on 1141m2 with BONUS12x7 GARAGE!
Charming, tranquil and private, this stand out home is one that is often sought but rarely found. Located upon a whopping 1141m2 and in the center of Drysdale, this is your chance to secure that lifestyle property you have been waiting for!
Set in an exclusive tree-lined pocket of Drysdale, you'll be impressed from the moment you turn into the street! The front manicured gardens are an inviting welcome for what else is to come. Built by renowned Wookey Master Builders' this home offers the utmost charm and character from the moment of entry, where you're immediately welcomed by a spacious separate lounge which offers split system heating and cooling and stunning garden views. Also, at the fore of the home sits the generous master suite, equipped with walk-in-robe, ensuite with shower, vanity and toilet and complete by a feature bay window with character window fretwork. The kitchen is the true heart of the home and offers timeless timber cabinetry, gas cooking and ample storage. An expansive meals/2nd living area offers easy entertaining and all complete by the warmth of a Coonara. The 2 remaining bedrooms are both large and offer built-in-robes, while the centrally located main bathroom with shower, bath & vanity, separate toilet and laundry complete this home.
What sets this home apart from the rest, is the large and versatile backyard. Sliding doors sit from the dining area and open out onto an expansive undercover alfresco, making that seamless flow for indoor/outdoor entertaining. The surprises do not stop there, as also on offer is a 12x7m separate garage, offering roller door access, power and Coonara, making it an impressive additional entertaining set up or work shop - whatever your heart desires! Double gate rear access and an additional neatly tucked away double carport sits at the rear of the property and is a true rarity! With more than enough room for multiple cars, trailers, caravans, boats and everything in between, all while offering lush grassed space and manicured gardens, this property truly offers it all, for the family that wants it all!
Additional features of the home include - Ducted heating, oversized DLUG with internal access and provisions to be turned into another living space, multiple split systems, manicured gardens, 12,000lt water tank and character period features throughout.
This central location is only a short stroll to all major amenities, schools, public transport and shops, while the Bay, boat ramp, golf club, wineries and beaches are only minutes away. Do not let this opportunity pass you by! The time to act is now to secure your lifestyle property in the heart of it all!
Insights: 18 James Court, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Pretty As A Picture
Boasting an enviable location right in the heart of Drysdale; walking distance to a vibrant restaurant and cafe scene, a fully equipped medical services hub, a thriving retail sector and the tranquillity of beautiful neighbouring parklands showcases a top shelf lifestyle property prospect.
* A gorgeous street appeal creates an anticipation of what is a custom build of the highest calibre
* A wonderful feature of this property is the generous primary living zone; an abundance of natural light courtesy of a lovely northerly aspect and expansive windows. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to a sheltered and private courtyard; an ideal space for an early coffee or an evening glass of wine from one of your favourite local wineries
* The kitchen is beautifully appointed and serves up a great practical zone; expansive benchtops, great storage solutions and a walk in pantry
* 2 oversized bedrooms
* All the modern comforts including ducted heating, split system cooling and many more fine features to be discovered upon inspection
* A single garage with remote controlled roller door, internal access, pedestrian rear access and additional off street car accommodation further endorse the user friendly nature of this property.
* Landscaped gardens are eye catching but boast a low maintenance brief
* A wonderful home for today or an exceptional addition to your property portfolio

Description:
Modern Quality Meets Coastal Living
Quietly tucked away in the popular and well-established Central Walk Estate, this striking home presents like new and will save you the hassle of building. Whether you are purchasing your first home, looking to downsize or have a strong desire to enjoy the lifestyle that comes with the Bellarine Peninsula, this home is certain to impress.
The true centrepiece of the home is the stylish kitchen boasting high quality appliances, ample cupboard space and stone bench tops. This overlooks the expansive open plan living and dining area, flooded with natural light.
Enjoy a seamless transition from indoor to outdoor where you will embrace a private entertaining deck. This is complemented by an immaculately landscaped yard with plenty of space for the kids and pets.
Completing the home is two extra separate living zones and three spacious bedrooms all with BIR's, the master complete with walk in robe and ensuite.
Features:
- DLUG with remote and internal access
- Side access with space to store a caravan/ trailer
- Ducted Heating
- Split System Heating and Cooling
- Ceiling Fans
- Water Tank
- Solar Panels
With quick access to the Bellarine Peninsula boasting word class wineries, beaches, cafés and highly regarded schooling. This is truly a place to call home for many years to come.

Description:
Home is where the heart is
Featuring an eye-catching stencilled feature driveway & landscaped garden on your walk in. A north facing study nook for those who like to work from home. The super-sized master bedroom is made for a king-size bed suite, dresser & still with space for a quiet retreat. A spacious walk in robe compliments the opulent ensuite.
A second semi-formal lounge is the ideal breakaway space for a home theatre or games centre.
The kitchen, dining and casual lounge is the central hub of the home with easy access to an incredibly designed covered outdoor room, complete with feature hardwood bar.
Kitchen features all the amenities for the budding cook or the Michelin star chef alike; island preparation bench, Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, Westinghouse wall oven, cooktop & rangehood as well as plenty of cupboard & drawer space.
Three good sized bedrooms, all with built in robes serviced by the central bathroom, complete with shower, bath and vanity.
A wider than normal double garage with both backyard and house access.
Ducted central heating throughout for winter & split system air conditioning for summer.
This family home is only missing one thing, you.

Description:
SECLUDED, STYLISH, SEDUCTIVE AND SINGLE LEVEL
The exclusivity of a cul-de-sac setting in Drysdales most desirable quarter complements the evident quality and comfort of a design that lets your upscale in style or downsize free from compromise.
Raked ceilings, double-glazed windows and generous dimensions define a living/dining domain that includes an open-plan kitchen fitted and finished to the highest contemporary standards.
Three bedrooms and two bathrooms provide accommodation thats perfectly in keeping with this residences focus on refinement, including a main bedroom accompanied by walk-in robes and an instantly appealing ensuite.
Architecture that captures the light and creates an immediate sense of excellence is enhanced by the clever convenience of a large separate laundry, split system heating/cooling and a secure double garage while a covered, decked backdrop created with entertaining in mind enjoys the advantage of the northerly rear aspect.
Walk to Drysdale Central shopping and wander to Drysdale and Lake Lorne reserves from this superlative single level residence.

Description:
Perfectly Balanced Semi-Rural Retreat
The Feel:
So many of us are searching for a healthy balance between lifestyle, space, privacy and convenience. This unique offering to the market of 3.8 picturesque acres complete with a charming 4/5 bedroom homestead, gifts you all of the above in a remarkably composed environment, moments from modern convenience.
The Facts:
-Your eye will immediately be drawn to the lush green acres and native flora enveloping the property
-’Solid as a rock’ with a family friendly layout, the charming and spacious home faces directly to the sunny north
-Dual living areas ensure everyone has the space and privacy they need, while inviting family and friends to gather
-Cedar windows/doors, stunning semi-rural outlooks and seamless flow to the outdoors projects a calming energy
-Many a long winded brunch will be enjoyed on the undercover alfresco deck, appreciating early morning sun
-Timber cabinetry warms the functional kitchen, with upgraded stainless steel Bosch and Kleenmaid apps
-Parents will enjoy retreating to their spacious master suite, boasting views across the gardens, ensuite and WIR
-The fifth bedroom is privately placed, gifting option as a home office with the convenience of external entry
-No farmhouse would be complete without a wood fire, enjoy yours along with backup from a Fujitsu split system unit
-Your semi sustainable lifestyle begins here with established fruit trees bearing apples, apricots, plums, pears and lemons
-Vegetable gardens are already in situ, close by to a secured pen suggesting use as a generous chicken coop
-Electric fencing borders 4 secure paddocks, ideal for horse agistment with access to nearby stable and float port
-Automatic gates lead to the two car garage which easily accommodates vehicles, with additional workshop space plus tack and feed room
-Right of way enables access to the rear of the property via two entry points, prioritising serviceability
-Multiple award winning wineries and restaurants surround you, completing this idyllic lifestyle choice
-Bordering the Bellarine Rail Trail, 10 minutes to Ocean Grove and 20 minutes to the Geelong CBD for commuters
Can’t decide between a seachange or a treechange? Position yourself for both!
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
QUIET LOCATION, SECLUDED TOWNHOUSE
When I entered this beautifully presented townhouse I felt like I could just sit down and relax. Light, airy, spacious architecturally designed with Clerestory windows. The architect knew how to make the most of the north facing aspects of this site. The size of the townhouse will surprise you.
There are many features you will enjoy about this home and its surrounds, no expense has been spared, double-glazed windows and solar panels will help keep down the living expenses. Kitchen appliances have been updated recently making it an appealing place to spend time cooking meals for family and friends. This is not your everyday floorplan either. Three bedrooms, one of which is currently being used as a study. Ensuite off the master bedroom complete with bath.
Drive into Marsh Court and what you will notice is a tree lined street that changes with the seasons. This rear townhouse with only two on the site, is very secure and private and only a short stroll to the hub of Drysdale with shops, medical centres and all the amenities you require at your fingertips for day to day living.
So if you are looking to enjoy a quiet life visiting cafes and restaurants, or just to downsize into this lovely home then why not call to inspect?
Insights: 2/10 Marsh Court, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 2 other 3 bedroom unit in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Rural lifestyle / Investment opportunity
Craving the rural lifestyle, but want to be close to town this is an opportunity for a savvy buyer, who wants just that.
Located just a 10-minute stroll to Drysdales main shopping hub, with supermarkets, retail shops, and cafés, this property is superbly centrally located, also only minutes from several primary and secondary schools, 20 minutes drive from Geelong and central to all the Bellarine has to offer in the way of wineries, beaches, golf clubs, fishing and a growing infrastructure of lifestyle amenities.
The property itself is space personified, situated on 3,098m2 (approx. ¾ acre) of gardens and mature trees with shady nooks a veritable adventure playground for kids and space for plenty of gear such as boats vans or tradies kit.
The home is ranch style consisting of 4 bedrooms, spacious living area and separate kitchen area, bathroom and laundry with a second shower.
The design of the property means you will have the ability to easily update without too much effort, with raked ceilings and open spaces, bedrooms are of a good size.
The potential of this property is boundless and with creative thinking this property could be a jewel in the crown of this up and coming sought after area on the Bellarine.
This property also has the potential for subdivision (STCA) making it attractive for the smart investor.
Whatever way you view this property you will not be disappointed as opportunities are endless for this superb holding.

Description:
Perfect Peppermint
Super spacious family living, lifestyle & location on a huge 1459m2 allotment! Landscaped gardens guide you up the exposed aggregate drive to your double garage that has rear access perfect to store a trailer, small boat or jet skis. Open the front door to stylish floors including floating floor boards & new carpet throughout. The Enormous lounge has garden & deck views. This flows into the modern kitchen with built in wine racks, big walk in pantry to store all the groceries, stainless steel appliances including 2 wall ovens, 5 burner gas cook top, range hood & dishwasher. Open plan dining & 2 living areas have sliding doors to the deck & pool views. Down the hall are bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 which all have built robes. Serviced by a central bathroom with separate shower & his/hers vanity basins with 4 cupboards. Also here is the vast laundry, separate toilet & 2 nearby cupboards, one broom & one linen. The master bedroom is huge with a walk in robe, ceiling fan, full en-suite, again with his/hers basins, 4 cupboards, separate shower & spa bath. A great size study situated right next to the enterance is perfect for a home office or students of the house. Great undercover & open deck is perfect for entertaining by the pool with built in seats. Also out the back is the salt chlorination solar heated 45000 ltr, 9.5 x 4.5 meter pool providing many hours of water fun for all the family to enjoy as the owners did. The rest of the backyard is ever so private divided by retainer walls & grassed areas ideal for the gardener in the family to plant whatever takes their fancy with a nearby garden shed. Gated side of the house is perfect to use as a dog run. Additional features include ducted heating & evaporate cooling, walking distance to Christian College & all your café & shopping needs in the township of Drysdale. Not to mention a few minutes' drive down the road are award winning wineries, the bay & boat ramps, walking tracks & everything the Bellarine has to offer.
